openamp
Xilinx Vitis Drivers API Documentation

  • Data Structures
Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
fw_rsc_hdrStruct fw_rsc_hdr - firmware resource entry header : resource type : resource data
fw_rsc_vdevStruct fw_rsc_vdev - virtio device header : virtio device id (as in virtio_ids.h) is a unique rproc-wide notify index for this vdev
fw_rsc_vdev_vringStruct fw_rsc_vdev_vring - vring descriptor entry : device address : the alignment between the consumer and producer parts of the vring : num of buffers supported by this vring (must be power of two) is a unique rproc-wide notify index for this vring
fw_rsc_vendorStruct fw_rsc_vendor - remote processor vendor specific resource : length of the resource
image_store_opsStruct image_store_ops - user defined image store operations : user defined callback to open the "firmware" to prepare loading : user defined callback to close the "firmware" to clean up after loading : user defined callback to load the firmware contents to target memory or local memory : loader supported features
loader_opsStruct loader_ops - loader operations : define how to get the executable headers : define how to load the target data : define how to get the resource table target address, offset to the ELF image file and size of the resource table
remoteprocStruct remoteproc
remoteproc_memStruct remoteproc_mem
remoteproc_opsStruct remoteproc_ops
remoteproc_virtioStruct remoteproc_virtio pointer to private data address of vdev resource metal I/O region of vdev_info, can be NULL notification function virtio device list node
resource_tableStruct resource_table - firmware resource table header : version number : number of resource entries : reserved (must be zero) : array of offsets pointing at the various resource entries
rpmsg_deviceStruct rpmsg_device - representation of a RPMsg device : list of endpoints : name service endpoint : table endpoint address allocation
rpmsg_device_opsStruct rpmsg_device_ops - RPMsg device operations : send RPMsg data
rpmsg_hdrStruct rpmsg_hdr - common header for all rpmsg messages : source address : destination address : reserved for future use : length of payload (in bytes) : message flags
rpmsg_virtio_deviceStruct rpmsg_virtio_device - representation of a rpmsg device based on virtio : rpmsg device, first property in the struct : pointer to the virtio device : pointer to receive virtqueue : pointer to send virtqueue : pointer to the shared buffer I/O region : pointer to the shared buffers pool
rpmsg_virtio_shm_poolStruct rpmsg_virtio_shm_pool - shared memory pool used for rpmsg buffers : base address of the memory pool : available memory size : total pool size
virtio_vring_infoStruct virtio_vring_info virtio queue vring alloc info vring notify id metal I/O region of the vring memory, can be NULL
